author: Muhammad Ali
quote: I hate every minute of training. But I said, don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life a champion

author: John Wooden
quote: Do not let what you can do interfere with what you can do

author: Elon Musk
quote: I think it is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary

author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee
quote: Age is no barrier. It’s a limitation you put on your mind

author: Bruce Jenner
quote: I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability.

author: Billie Jean King
quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right

author: Mark Spitz
quote: If you fail to prepare, you’re prepared to fail

author: Muhammad Ali
quote: I don’t count my situps. I only start counting once it starts hurting

author: Michael Jordan
quote: I’ve failed over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed

author: Derek Jeter
quote: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there’s no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do

author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you don’t take

author: Michael Jordan
quote: Never say never because limits, like fears, are often just an illusion

author: Lou Holtz
quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period

author: Dean Karnazes
quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up

author: Jim Valvano
quote: Never give up! Failure and rejection are only the first step to succeeding

author: Jack Dempsey
quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can’t.

author: Charles Barkley
quote: If you are afraid of failure you don’t deserve to be successful

author: Mike Ditka
quote: You’re never a loser until you quit trying

author: Carl Lewis
quote: It’s all about the journey, not the outcome

author: Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson
quote: If something stands between you and your success, move it. Never be denied

author: Venus Williams
quote: Just believe in yourself. Even if you don’t pretend that you do and, and some point, you will

author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee
quote: The only person who can stop you from reaching your goals is you

author: Knute Rockne
quote: One man practicing sportsmanship is far better than 50 preaching it

author: Bo Jackson
quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there

author: Ted Williams
quote: Just keep going. Everybody gets better if they keep at it
